column2: In relation to the Petitioner’s complaint in relation to the violation of his rights guaranteed
under  Article  13(1),  it  is  the  Petitioner’s  contention  that  the  6th  Respondent  is  guilty  of
impropriety  or  connivance  with  the  1st-4th  Respondents,  which  led  to  his  arbitrary  and

illegal  arrest  which 
is  without  reasonable  cause  and, 
therefore,  a  violation  of  his
constitutional rights protecting him from the same.
